user_request: Clear the cart on walmart. Add usb-b to the cart on walmart
screen_desc: The screenshot displays the Walmart website on a mobile browser, showcasing a Cyber Monday deal for a Lenovo 10" Tablet, now priced at $129 (originally $199). At the top, there is a notification for Cyber deals, with an option to shop for more deals. Below the main deal, there is a prompt for selecting pickup or delivery options, and a suggestion to download the Walmart app for easier shopping. The cart icon shows one item and a price of $11.97.
